remarks: Two ways to express symmetric difference.  This theorem shows the equivalence of the definition of symmetric difference in [Stoll] p. 13 and the restated definition in Example 4.1 of [Stoll] p. 262.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)
statement: symdif1 $p |- ( ( A \ B ) u. ( B \ A ) ) = ( ( A u. B ) \ ( A i^i B ) ) $.
